title: Article 4 of the following order (insofar as it relates to a product as defined in
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Consumer Price Survey)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Statistics (Consumer Price Survey) 

Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited statistic (consumer price survey) order 2022

title: Article 4 of the following order (insofar as it relates to a product as defined in
heading: 2. (1) In this Order –
text_raw:
2. (1) In this Order – 

“direction” means a direction under section 26 of the Statistics Act 1993 (No. 
21 of 1993) made pursuant to the requirement prescribed under Article 4; 
“home loan” means any loan or advance or any other arrangement whatever by 
virtue of which interest is paid or payable, which, without having been used for 
any other purpose, is used by an individual solely for the purpose of defraying 
money employed in the purchase of a qualifying residence or in paying off 
another loan used for such purpose; 
“product” means – 
(a) 
(b) 

a product within the meaning of the Regulation, and 
a product specified in Schedule 2; 

“qualifying residence” means a residential premises situated in the State, which 
is used as the sole or main residence of – 
an individual, 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

a former or separated spouse of an individual, or a former civil 
partner or a civil partner from whom the individual is living 
separately in circumstances where reconciliation is unlikely, or 

person who, in relation to an individual, is a dependent relative, 
and which is, where the residential premises is provided by the 
individual, provided 
rent-free and without any other 
consideration; 

“Regulation” means Regulation (EU) 2016/792 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 11 May 20161; 
“survey” means the Consumer Price Survey conducted by the Central Statistics 
Office for the purposes of obtaining information referred to in Schedule 1, 
including for the purposes of compliance with the Regulation. 

(2) A word or expression that is used in this Order and also used in the 
Regulation has the same meaning in this Order as in the Regulation, except 
where the context otherwise requires. 

1 OJ No. L 135, 24.5.2016, p. 11. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [658] 3

title: Article 4 of the following order (insofar as it relates to a product as defined in
heading: 3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical
text_raw:
3. This Order applies to an undertaking that is classified for statistical 
purposes under any section of NACE Rev. 2, as set out in Annex I to 
Regulation (EC) No. 1893/2006 of the European Parliament and of the Council 
of 20 December 20062, as amended by Regulation (EC) No. 295/2008 of the 
European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 20083, Regulation (EU) 
No. 70/2012 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 18 January 
20124 and Regulation (EU) 2019/1243 of the European Parliament and of the 
Council of 20 June 20195.
text_norm: 3 order applies undertaking classified statistical purpose section nace rev 2 set annex regulation (ec) no 1893 2006 european parliament council 20 december 20062 amended regulation (ec) no 295 2008 european parliament council 11 march 20083 regulation (eu) no 70 2012 european parliament council 18 january 20124 regulation (eu) 2019 1243 european parliament council 20 june 20195

title: Article 4 of the following order (insofar as it relates to a product as defined in
heading: 4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies –
text_raw:
4. A requirement on undertakings to which this Order applies – 

(a) 

(b) 

subject to paragraph (b), to provide, for the purposes of the 
survey, information the general nature of which is specified in 
Schedule 1, and 
to provide the information referred to in paragraph (a) monthly 
in the period from December 2022 to November 2027 and in 
relation to the month concerned, is hereby prescribed. 

2 OJ No. L 393, 30.12.2006, p 1 
3 OJ No. L 97, 9.4.2008, p.13 
4 OJ No. L 32, 3.2.2012, p.1 
5 OJ No. L 198, 25.7.2019, p.241 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [658]

title: Article 4 of the following order (insofar as it relates to a product as defined in
Article 4 of the following order (insofar as it relates to a product as defined in
heading: Information regarding the following, as it relates to such product sold
text_raw:
1. 
Information regarding the following, as it relates to such product sold 
by the undertaking concerned as is specified in the notice of the direction 
concerned, and specifying the month to which the information relates: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 
(f) 
(g) 

the purchase price of the product on such day of the 
month as is specified in the notice; 
the average purchase price of the product on such day of 
the month as is specified in the notice; 
the quantity sold of the product on such day of the 
month as is specified in the notice; 
the unit of measurement for the purchase price of the 
product; 
the characteristics of the product; 
the taxes and excise duties levied on the product; 
the terms of sale of the product.

title: Article 4 of the following order (insofar as it relates to a product as defined in
heading: Information regarding –
text_raw:
2. 

Information regarding – 

(a) 

(b) 

the type of home loans provided by the undertaking, by 
reference to the method by which the interest payable by 
virtue of the home loan is calculated, and 
in relation to each type of home loan referred to in 
paragraph (a), the average rate of interest charged, on 
such day of the month as is specified in the notice of the 
direction concerned, by the undertaking by virtue of 
home loans of that type.
text_norm: 2 information regarding - (a) (b) type home loan provided undertaking reference method interest payable virtue home loan calculated relation type home loan referred paragraph (a) average rate interest charged day month specified notice direction concerned undertaking virtue home loan type

title: Article 4 of the following order (insofar as it relates to a product as defined in
heading: Information regarding –
text_raw:
3. 

Information regarding – 

(a) 

(b) 

the subscriptions charged by an undertaking that is a 
trade union, in respect of membership of the trade union, 
by reference to the period of membership to which the 
subscriptions relate, and 
the method of calculation of the subscriptions referred to 
in paragraph (a). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [658] 5
